Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Klavierstück in D-flat major, S. 189a/2

c. 1845 · LW – · R. –

Liszt wrote multiple album leaves on the main theme he used in both the Ballade no. 1 in D-flat major (S. 170; LW A 117; R. 15) and, earlier, Dernière illusion (no. 4) from Préludes et Harmonies poétiques et religieuses (S. 171d). These album leaves are very similar, but at least five versions exist with slight differences: four in A-flat major (S. 189a/1; LW A116) and one in D-flat major (S. 189a/2).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 6 · Z. A/B 14501 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 3
